definition: Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand

sentences.english: The Tai groups of Thailand evolved into diverse sub-ethnicities in the process of formation and development.
sentences.chinese: 泰国的泰语民族在形成发展过程中，形成许多支系。

sentences.english: Can I sit in on your Intermediate Hittite class?
sentences.chinese: 我能旁听你的“中级希泰语”课程吗？

sentences.english: The Chaozhou Speech in Thailand has had a close contact with Tai language in hundreds years.
sentences.chinese: 数百年间汉语潮汕话与泰语有密切的接触关系。
电视中播放着叽里咕噜的泰语节目。

sentences.english: The Thai phrase "to eat" translates as "eat rice."
sentences.chinese: 在泰语词组中，“吃饭”则要翻译为“吃米”。

sentences.english: Then I will be like a fool who can speak neither Thai nor Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 到时候我可是一个既不会泰语也不会中文的傻瓜了。

sentences.english: I have no idea whether or not they are translations of the original Thai captions.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他们是否是翻译的原始泰语图释。

sentences.english: Sorry, I can not speak Thai. Can you speak English?
sentences.chinese: 他对我讲泰语，如果我也能对答如流多好啊。

sentences.english: The numeral is a part of speech which has great difference in Zhuang and Thai language.
sentences.chinese: 数词是壮语和泰语差别较大的一个词类。

sentences.english: I'm ethnic Thai and fluent in both English and Thai as native speaker.
sentences.chinese: 我是泰国人种，能像当地人一样流利地说泰语和英语。

sentences.english: The article attempts to present using comparison method in compare Chinese and Thai measure words.
sentences.chinese: 本文试图通过对比的方法来进行对汉泰语量词的比较。

sentences.english: The School prepared a Thai basic lesson for our team.
sentences.chinese: 学校为我们预备了基本泰语课程。

definition: Korean language (esp. in context of South Korea)
